languages.text: То, что когда-то было пленником, теперь превратилось в некое подобие живого операционного кресла с полным медицинским инвентарем.

traits.locale_text: То, что когда-то было пленником, теперь превратилось в некое подобие живого операционного кресла с полным медицинским инвентарем.

languages.text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
languages.original_text: То, что когда-то было пленником, теперь превратилось в некое подобие живого операционного кресла с полным медицинским инвентарем.

traits.locale_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.
What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

languages.text: 这具俘虏的尸体，如今经过了改造，像是一间拥有生命的手术室一样，配备着各种各样的手术工具。
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: 这具俘虏的尸体，如今经过了改造，像是一间拥有生命的手术室一样，配备着各种各样的手术工具。

languages.text: Was früher einmal der Körper des Gefangenen war, ähnelt jetzt einem lebenden Operationssaal, einschließlich eines vollständigen Inventars an Operationsbesteck.
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: Was früher einmal der Körper des Gefangenen war, ähnelt jetzt einem lebenden Operationssaal, einschließlich eines vollständigen Inventars an Operationsbesteck.

languages.text: Lo que antes fuese el cuerpo del cautivo se asemeja ahora a un quirófano viviente equipado con una panoplia completa de instrumental quirúrgico.
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: Lo que antes fuese el cuerpo del cautivo se asemeja ahora a un quirófano viviente equipado con una panoplia completa de instrumental quirúrgico.

languages.text: Le corps du prisonnier ressemble désormais à un véritable bloc opératoire vivant, doté de tous les instruments dont un chirurgien pourrait avoir besoin.
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: Le corps du prisonnier ressemble désormais à un véritable bloc opératoire vivant, doté de tous les instruments dont un chirurgien pourrait avoir besoin.

languages.text: かつて捕虜の身体であったものは、今では手術道具一式が揃った、生きた手術室といった有様である。
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: かつて捕虜の身体であったものは、今では手術道具一式が揃った、生きた手術室といった有様である。

languages.text: Tutsağın bedeninden arda kalanlar, bir ameliyathaneyi andırıyor. Cerrahi aletler bile var.
languages.original_text: What used to be the captive's body now resembles a living operating theatre, complete with a full inventory of surgical tools.

traits.locale_text: Tutsağın bedeninden arda kalanlar, bir ameliyathaneyi andırıyor. Cerrahi aletler bile var.
